exp: acne rosacea is a vascular disorder predominantly effecting central face manifesting with erythema and telengiectasia, with episodes of inflammation during the periods of inflammation papules, pustules swelling will develop. agravated by eating hot spicy foods alcohol, extremes of temperatures. Acne vulgaris is characterised by the presence of open or closed comedones systemic lupus erythematosus the rash is fixed over the malar area and nose, aggravated by exposure to sunlight.
